about_the_game:
"…but, just as we were about to leave, the faint glow from the moon danced across the tomb entrance.”

Excerpt from Famed Explorer Joseph Billingsworth’s Memoirs


Far from the bustling Lunar New Year festivities held in Parid, an incredible discovery was made: an ancient tomb of a long-forgotten hero!

This righteous hero, who was fiercely loyal to Farhul, was said to have worn legendary armor that could hold control over evil spirits and strike fear into those not pure-of-heart.

With the re-discovered armor waiting for a new owner, will you take up the mantle and bring peace to Farhul once more? The FREE Dynasty Cosmetic Pack is available to download now!

Looking to experience For The King’s blend of tabletop and roguelike gameplay for yourself?

Now is the perfect time to plan an adventure in Fahrul, with 66% OFF the base game as part of the Lunar New Year Sale!

Owners of the base game can, not only snatch up the FREE Dynasty Cosmetic Pack, but can also get 33% OFF the incredible Lost Civilization Adventure Pack DLC as part of the Lunar New Year Sale too!

Good fortunes, Adventurers!

  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
